arts.ttl: How Kluivert & Evanilson broke Premier League records
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundits Danny Murphy and Dion Dublin look at how Bournemouth's Justin Kluivert and Evanilson both broke Premier League penalty records.

arts.ttl: O'Neil disappointed as 'self-inflicted' errors cost Wolves
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers manager Gary O'Neil expressed his disappointment after his side conceded four goals to Bournemouth at the Molineux stadium.

arts.ttl: Justin Kluivert, Evanilson make Premier League history in Bournemouth's win over Wolves
arts.sum: Justin Kluivert and Evanilson create Premier League history in Saturday's 4-2 win over Wolverhampton Wanderers at Molineux.

arts.ttl: Evanilson's performance 'gave us the game' - Iraola
arts.sum: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola expressed his satisfaction following his side's victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers, highlighting the "phenomenal" performance of Evanilson.

arts.ttl: O'Neil disappointed as 'self-inflicted' errors cost Wolves
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers manager Gary O'Neil expressed his disappointment after his side conceded four goals to Bournemouth at the Molineux stadium.

arts.ttl: Kluivert scores hat-trick of penalties as Bournemouth beat Wolves
arts.sum: Justin Kluivert became the first player to score a hat-trick of penalties in a single Premier League game as AFC Bournemouth punished an error-strewn display from Wolverhampton Wanderers to win 4-2 at Molineux. But Kluivert’s record-breaking encounter could not have come without Evanilson, who along with his Dutch team-mate, became the first player to win three penalties in the same game in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Wolves goalie Jose Sa supported by manager after confronting angry fans during match
arts.sum: Wolverhampton manager Gary O’Neil expressed his “full support” for Jose Sa after the goalkeeper confronted angry fans at halftime of the team’s 4-2 loss to Bournemouth in the English Premier League on Saturday. Sa gave away two of the record three penalties converted by Justin Kluivert after being tackled receiving back-passes.

arts.ttl: O’Neil Must Axe £40k-p/w Wolves Dud to Avoid Relegation
arts.sum: Gary O'Neil should drop Jose Sa after his poor display against Bournemouth today, and reinstate Sam Johnstone as his number one.

arts.ttl: West Ham and Wolves like in-form striker, club urged not to sell him 'at any price' in January
arts.sum: West Ham and Wolves have both shown an interest...

arts.ttl: Evanilson 'difference maker': Iraola heaps praise on Brazilian
arts.sum: Evanilson was the difference maker for AFC Bournemouth against Wolves, Andoni Iraola said.
